name: RaccAttacc!
description:
It's a nice, normal day in the neighborhood. As a raccoon,  that means wreaking havoc on the neighbors! Collect the 4 items in each block while bumping into objects and hitting the neighbors as much as you can. Thanks for playing!

Big thanks to KingKevin for making the road tileset and houses.

due to a build error, the healthbar is not in the best place. with my current skills  in unity, I am not able to find and debug it.  Enter fullscreen for best experience.

Note: this is my first ever gamejam game, and I'm not really satisfied with how it came out.  The scene transitions are awkward, the menus are downright bad, the pixel art is inconsistent and the gameplay is janky.

Controls:

WASD- move

SHIFT- sprint

SPACE- jump

leftmouse/U- attack

the trash cans give you different things

1. superslippy

2. superspeed (way too fast atm)

3. superstrength

4.  hp recovery

collect the bananna peel, drink can, crate, and cigar to complete the level.
